src.groovy.com.grailsrocks.authentication
Class AuthenticatedUser

java.lang.Object
  src.groovy.com.grailsrocks.authentication.AuthenticatedUser

class AuthenticatedUser

Class encapsulating the result of a login. Encapsulates errors also so that login failures to not use exceptions (very bad for performance and they are not ... exceptional)

Property Summary
static def AWAITING_CONFIRMATION

static def ERROR_INCORRECT_CREDENTIALS

static def ERROR_LOGIN_NAME_NOT_AVAILABLE

static def ERROR_NO_SUCH_LOGIN

def attributes

Any application-specific attributes you wish to store for this session can go here

boolean confirmed

True if email address has been confirmed to work

boolean loggedIn

Is the user currently logged in

java.lang.String login

java.util.Date loginTime

Date/time at which this user logged in

int result

The result code for the outcome of the last login attempt

def userObjectId

The domain object id of the user principal object for this account
